feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:03 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: SE 16 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm near noon. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
